title: In-Game shop wont open but P brings up something different. READ DESC PLS

embed.description: well, while im in game I press P and it brings up Advanced Player Stats... I have tried to look in keybinding, and there is nothing wrong even if I restore. so I uninstalled and reinstalled and it STILL wont work. So now I think it may be my computer but what would cause that??

body:
well, while im in game I press P and it brings up Advanced Player Stats... I have tried to look in keybinding, and there is nothing wrong even if I restore. so I uninstalled and reinstalled and it STILL wont work. So now I think it may be my computer but what would cause that??
and one last thing even when I put on quick cast it shows the hit box but still works like quickcast plsss help me I cant play without fixing this problem.

replies.body:
I've seen this issue a few different times. Each time, it's been caused by some attempted manual modifications to game files going wrong, though I don't know if this is the same case with your situation. In any event, I'd like you to try resetting the files that stores the settings you're trying to change.

>**Log into the game** then navigate to your config folder, which should be in your install directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

>Delete these two files:
**- input.ini**
**- PersistedSettings.json**

After deleting those files, hop into a custom match to confirm everything has been reset, then test your ability to access the shop. Let me know if this worked!
